text: Cowboy is a 1966 American short documentary film directed by Michael Ahnemann and produced by Ahnemann and Gary Schlosser. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== *List of American films of 1966 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 films Category:1966 documentary films Category:1966 short films Category:1966 independent films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films Category:United States Information Agency films
title: Cowboy (1966 film)
